LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.description: Spectating slaves will be 100% suppressed. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.comps.1.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.comps.2.label: participant count
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.comps.3.label: started at altar or ideogram
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.comps.4.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.0.label: Botched
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.0.descripti: The {0} was botched. The mage retaliated in fear and desperation.
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.1.label: Lethal
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.1.descripti: The {0} was lethal. The ritual was intended to sever the mage from magic, not kill the mage.
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.2.label: Success
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.2.descripti: The {0} was a success. The voidseeker effectively severed the mage's magic.
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.3.label: Flawless
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic.outcomeChances.3.descripti: The {0} was flawless - the ceremony brought compassion and freedom to the mage.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.description: Spectating slaves will be 100% suppressed. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.comps.1.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.comps.2.label: participant count
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.comps.3.label: started at altar or ideogram
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.comps.4.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.outcomeChances.0.label: Failed
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.outcomeChances.0.descript: The {0} was botched. The voidseeker was unable to bridge a magical connection.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.outcomeChances.1.label: Success
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.outcomeChances.1.descript: The {0} was a success. The voidseeker granted the spark of magic.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.outcomeChances.2.label: Inspired
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagic.outcomeChances.2.descript: The {0} was flawless - the ceremony reaffirmed our beliefs, bringing the gift of magic and granting inspirational visions.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.description: Spectating slaves will be 100% suppressed. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.comps.1.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.comps.2.label: participant count
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.comps.3.label: started at altar or ideogram
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.comps.4.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.outcomeChances.0.des: The {0} was a success but lacked any real feeling or energy.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.outcomeChances.1.des: The {0} was a success. A gifted individual has taken a great step towards becoming a more powerful asset to our colony.
LanguageData.TM_BestowMagicClass.outcomeChances.2.des: The {0} was inspiring - through a magnificent spectacle of arcane and emotional energy, the colony has gained another powerful mage.
